title: Actor Chetan Kumar arrested by Bengaluru police over tweet on judge - The News Minute
content:
1. Actor Chetan Kumar arrested by Bengaluru police over tweet on judge  The News Minute
  2. Kannada Actor Chetan Kumar Arrested For Tweet Against Judge Hearing Hijab Case  NDTV
  3. Film actor arrested in Karnataka over his remarks on a judge hearing hijab petitions  The Indian Express
  4. Kannada actor Chetan arrested for tweeting against judiciary on hijab case  India Today
  5. Sandalwood actor Chetan Ahimsa arrested by Bengaluru police  Deccan Herald
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Actor Chetan Kumar has been arrested by the Bengaluru police, his wife Megha alleged in a Facebook video on Tuesday, February 22. Bengaluru Police Commissioner Kamal Pant told TNM that Chetan has been taken into custody and is being questioned over a tweet about one of the sitting Karnataka High Court judges who is part of the three-judge bench hearing the batch of pleas against the hijab ban in campuses. A decision on arresting Chetan will be taken after the questioning, Pant said.
